title: Excessive wait times in queue
body: Just curious why are we sitting in queue and it sasy approx 2 mins and we don't get in til 10 mins or so, is there something wrong with dynamic queue  or have people just stopped playing?

replies.body:
Could be a mixture of. 

People not liking the new queue, Poor population at time of queue (people at work / school / asleep) & Rank of yourself / ranks of others in queue at that time.

Pretty suckie though. Hopefully they are able to fine tune something to make it better as this seems to be affecting quite a few of people :(...
